flavor.reason: The restaurant, Bank & Bourbon, is praised for its food and drinks, particularly the appetizers and cocktails, though there are mixed opinions about pricing and service.

freshness.reason: Guests appreciated the good quality of food, fresh ingredients, and well-prepared dishes, along with thoughtful touches like complimentary hot apple cider.

service.reason: While many guests found the staff friendly and attentive, there were frequent complaints about slow or unresponsive service and occasional lapses in professionalism.

environment.reason: The historic Art Deco design and modern, clean rooms with city views were appreciated, though some areas showed signs of wear and occasional cleanliness issues.

value.reason: Despite the central location and proximity to attractions, high fees and occasional service or room quality issues led some guests to feel the experience was overpriced.
